Name: Goddard Park Carousel
Notes: originally located at Lakeside Park, Syracuse, New York, moved 1908 to Rocky Point Amusement Park, Rhode Island and 1930 to present location

Name: Zeum Carousel
Location: Yerba Buena Gardens, San Francisco, California
Notes: built in 1904 for San Francisco, sent to instead Seattle's Luna Park due to 1906 earthquake, returned to Playland-At-The-Beach, San Francisco in 1914 until 1972; 1972 to 1984: In storage at Roswell, New Mexico for restoration; 1984 to 1998: Shoreline Village, California; 1998: Yerba Buena Gardens, San Francisco, California

Name: Lakeside Carousel
Notes: originally located in Harvey Lake, Pennsylvania, moved to Florida in 1986 and present location in 1996

Name: Riverfront Park Carousel
Notes: a wedding gift for Looff's daughter Emma Vogel and her husband Louis Vogel, who owned Natatorium Park; moved to present location in 1975; operational brass rings; Ruth & Sons organ; National Historic Landmark

Name: Whalom Park Carousel
Notes: Moved to Whalom Park in 1912, Featured 2 Looff Sea Dragons, Broken up at auction April 15, 2000
